attachments.title: WSL2 will be generally available in Windows 10, version 2004 | Windows Command Line
attachments.text: WSL2 will soon be officially available as part of Windows 10, version 2004! As we get ready for general availability, we want to share one additional change: updating how the Linux kernel inside of WSL2 is installed and serviced on your machine.
attachments.fallback: Windows Command Line: WSL2 will be generally available in Windows 10, version 2004 | Windows Command Line
